transcripts: Spend less time here and more time here. The Black & Decker 8 volt max impact screwdriver is designed to complete a large range of applications up to 10 times faster and with twice the max torque. When it meets resistance the Black & Decker 8 volt max impact screwdriver automatically activates its micro impact mechanism to help meet the demands of the application so you can knock out the work and thanks to a powerful lithium-ion battery you'll have one less thing to worry about the battery holds a charge up to 18 months while delivering you long life. why reach for another cordless tool make an impact with ease and speed the Black & Decker 8 volt max impact screwdriver.
